module HSFM.Utils.MyPrelude where


import Data.List



-- |Turns any list into a list of the same length with the values
-- being the indices.
-- E.g.: "abdasd" -> [0,1,2,3,4,5]
listIndices :: [a] -> [Int]
listIndices = findIndices (const True)
